findings.message: The plan treats Firebase RTDB handling of `undefined` keys as "silently dropped"; this behavior should be stated as an implementation assumption (or validated in tests) because SDK behavior can vary and can cause write-time errors instead of omission.
`Inherited Outcome Contract` still has `Why: TBD`, leaving the business rationale metadata incomplete.

Fact-find says blast radius includes `useEodClosureData.ts`, but task scopes do not include any change there; likely harmless, but the plan should either list that file as unchanged-by-design or remove it from blast-radius wording for precision.
